description: Affordable REST API for scheduling and publishing social media posts across X Twitter LinkedIn Instagram Threads TikTok YouTube Facebook Bluesky Mastodon and Telegram with media uploads and LinkedIn analytics starting at $5.40/month yearly or $9/month
rules: Always authenticate with x-publora-key header for API requests
Use ISO 8601 UTC format for scheduledTime parameter
Posts support up to 4 images or 1 video per post
Create the post first with POST /create-post to get a postGroupId then use POST /get-upload-url with that postGroupId to upload media
Platform IDs use format platform-platformId such as twitter-123456 or linkedin-ABC123
Pricing starts at $5.40/month (yearly) or $9/month with full API access on all plans and 14-day free trial
